article_title: Map of inequality an indictment of misguided North Carolina policy
article_text:
North Carolina’s economic recovery and most of its population growth are centered in the urban counties of the Research Triangle, the Triad and Mecklenburg County while the rest of the state struggles

Counties that would benefit from more state spending are being denied

Instead, they’re getting tiny income tax cuts offset by higher state fees and a broadening of the sales tax
